name: AWS CDK Web Infrastructure Template
description: Reusable AWS CDK Python template for multi-domain web applications with VPC, ALB, EC2, CodeDeploy, and CloudWatch

patterns_included.name: Multi-Environment Configuration
patterns_included.description: Centralized config in constants.py with dev/prod separation

patterns_included.name: Network Stack
patterns_included.description: VPC with public/private subnets, NAT gateway, VPC endpoints

patterns_included.name: Compute Stack
patterns_included.description: EC2 instances with CodeDeploy, SNS alerts

patterns_included.name: ALB Construct
patterns_included.description: Application Load Balancer with SSL, host-based routing

patterns_included.name: CI/CD Workflows
patterns_included.description: GitHub Actions for testing and deployment
